4199753770d665dee7989ea73412bc44-663.name: Photography Home Page
4199753770d665dee7989ea73412bc44-663.content:
Wedding Photographer
in Phoenix

Capturing every Moment on Your Big Day

View Gallery

Engagements

Every couple's story started with a YES. Getting to work with my client's in that early part of the wedding journey is such a treat. It's a time they get to relax & just enjoy the moments. I get a chance to connect with my couple and hear how they met as it never gets old. As a wedding photographer in Phoenix I enjoy taking them on a mini adventure in our beautiful state. Whatever the adventure may be, I'm ready for it.

View Packages

Weddings

I live for wedding day with my couples. It's a day I get to serve my clients in so many ways as a photographer. I get to be a portrait photographer, a family photographer, a details photographer, but most importantly I get to be a trusted advisor on their big day. I've been down this path a few times and know how emotions can run. I'm there every step with my couples making sure they are enjoying their day all the while capturing it for them.

View Packages

Seniors

High school senior pictures have come a long ways. No longer are you forced into a boring headshot that looks like everyone else’s. You are different and that’s a great thing. Your senior pics are a once in a lifetime event. Our senior experience starts with our pre-shoot consultation where we discuss your wardrobe ideas to help you look your best. During your shoot we coach you along the way for the best poses so you rock your pics. Your Instagram will never look the same! 

View Packages

Fitness

What started as a niche area for me has grown into a true passion. Working with the fitness athlete has exposed me to a whole new world of "being in shape". I am continually humbled by the dedication and perseverance my clients make to achieve their athletic form. The sacrifice is real. Rather it be photographing them with dramatic lighting in studio or being on-location in Arizona, I get to showcase their amazing efforts.

View Packages

Full Sets

Thank you for stopping by. As a wedding photographer in Phoenix I enjoy traveling our state and abroad to photograph my couple’s biggest day. It’s a day filled with love, laughter, maybe a few tears and family. Feel free to browse the site or go straight to the portfolio page to see some of my work. I would welcome a chance to hear more about your own wedding and get amazing photos for you

Every love story is beautiful, but ours is my favorite.

Anonymous

Love doesn't make the world go round; Love makes the ride worthwhile.

Elizabeth Browning

Get in Touch...

Insert contact form here...

4199753770d665dee7989ea73412bc44-665.name: Photography – Weddings
4199753770d665dee7989ea73412bc44-665.content:
Capturing Priceless
Moments & Memories

View Gallery

Behind the Camera

Hi, I'm Chris

A Phoenix Wedding Photographer

Thank you for stopping by. As a Phoenix wedding photographer I enjoy traveling our state and abroad to photograph my couple’s biggest day. It’s a day filled with love, laughter, maybe a few tears and family. Feel free to browse the site or go straight to the portfolio page to see some of my work. I would welcome a chance to hear more about your own wedding and get amazing photos for you.

About Chris

Wedding Style

I believe the essence of a wedding are those candid moments that happen throughout the day. Rather it be a moment with your bridesmaids or the groom getting choked up reading his vows, those are what make your wedding special. I’ll get a few of those posed photos to make Mom happy but I want you to look back and relive your wedding exactly as it happened. 

It's all in the Details

Every piece of your wedding is special. You knew the moment when you found “the dress”. Earrings and shoes were close behind. Family keepsakes may be worn during the day to honor your grandparents. All of these items are dear to you and make your wedding unique. I make sure to photograph those details so you never forget that day, all of it. From wedding dresses to wedding rings and everything in between you will have it.

Bride and Groom

Many of today’s couples are choosing to do a “first look”. This is where the couple see each other before the ceremony. Typically the groom is off to a secluded spot and the bride approaches from behind. He turns to see her and the emotions come out! I am off in the distance photographing from afar as to not interrupt this sacred moment. When my clients ask about a first look, I always tell them I would do it if it were me. The reason is it’s the only time during the day when the bride and groom will have a few minutes alone. The day is filled with family and friends as it should be, but the bride and groom rarely have any time to themselves. Rather or not to do a first look is totally up to the couple and what they value.

Regardless of a first look I always get bride and groom portraits. Just the couple together before or after the ceremony. We head out to a fun spot where the light is fantastic and create some awesome images of the two of you. This is such a special time as the couple is amped up. This is truly one of the many highlights of photographing a wedding. Feeding off the energy of a couple in love and photographing their first minutes as husband and wife is truly special.

It's Party Time

Ahh the reception, time to let loose and enjoy the night. From father-daughter dances to sparkler exits, the evening is alive! As a newly wed couple you guys are in high demand. Spending time with your guests, shaking it on the dance floor, and shoving cake in each other’s mouths are what the night is about. Many couples choose to do a grand exit, that may be with sparklers, bubbles, or confetti. What ever you choose I will be there capturing every second of it.

FAQs

Is Chris the main photographer?

Yes! You hire me you get me. 🙂 Some photographers may have an associate shoot a wedding, but I shoot all of mine. I love you guys.

Do you hold dates?

Absolutely. With your 25% retainer fee, I lock in your wedding date and block out the day.

We may have a destination wedding, do you travel?

I love to travel. My bags are already packed!

Speaking of travel, do you charge travel fees?

If the wedding is within the state of AZ there are no additional fees. Outside the state, let’s talk.

We could use some recommendations for other vendors, do you know any?

I have a list ready to share with you!

How long until we get our photos?

My contract states within 30 days of the wedding. However, I tend to be faster than that.

Okay, how much does this cost?

We have packages starting at $2,300.

We have a few more questions.

Alright, let’s get those answered. You can contact me using the contact form at the bottom of this page or at 480-223-8615 and chris@chrisfrailey.com. 

Testimonials

What they Say

Best Photographer

Chris was THE BEST photographer we could have hoped for! He did a fantastic job of capturing our day and provided us with stunning photos that we will look back at and enjoy for the rest of our lives! We have so many candid photos of our family smiling and laughing at our reception and quite a few formals of just us that we adore! He is like a fly on the wall capturing everything exactly as it happens. If you are looking for a PHENOMENAL photographer at an EXTREMELY reasonable price, look no further, Chris is your guy!
Cynthia

Simply Phenomenal!!!

It was a gloomy Wednesday afternoon. The skies were grey and crying. Anxiety was high and the stress was through the roof. When Chris and his partner arrived all that stress settled. It can be difficult to not have a wedding planner/coordinator. A DJ and Photographer are crucial to make sure everything is smooth sailing. From the start Chris was on top of everything and made sure to get all our details shots and all the family shots we requested. He helped keep our timeline on track. We even got to throw in some fun/interesting shots. They captured us perfectly. I literally couldn’t have asked for better! I am so happy we chose Chris to capture our day and 10/10 would hire again! (for other types of photos of course haha)
Tristan

Wedding

Gallery

Get in Touch...

Add Contact Us form Here.

4199753770d665dee7989ea73412bc44-669.name: Photography – Engagements
4199753770d665dee7989ea73412bc44-669.content:
YOUR ENGAGEMENT BEGINS THE WEDDING JOURNEY

View Gallery

From Behind the Camera

Engagement Photos in Arizona

I love engagement sessions. It gives me the chance to interact with my clients in a relaxed environment. I get to hear the “how we met” stories, the wedding planning progress, and the future plans of my couples. The best part is this happens in gorgeous locations throughout Arizona.

About Chris

What to Expect

After consulting on where to shoot and what to wear, we’ll meet up at your location. We will take it slower, have some fun, get to know each other, and get you guys some awesome pics! Sessions generally last about an hour. If we need to go longer to get it all done then we will. 

What to Wear

I always tell clients to wear what makes you comfortable. This is your engagment and you want something that represents who you are during this time. Some clients take the opportunity as a chance to “dress up” and have some elegant photos. Others show up in casual dress and just want to have some fun for their save-the-date cards. The beauty of it is there is no right or wrong. You get to be you!

Location

This one takes on all forms. From the great outdoors of Flagstaff to the interior of a comic book shop, I’ve shot engagement sessions everywhere. Generally couples have a place that is special (where the big proposal happened) or they are looking to go to some place they have never been to just to mix it up. One of the beneifts of Arizona is there is a never ending list of places to shoot. If you want cactus we have it. If you want big city lights, we have it. If you want gritty urban and graffati, we have it. If you want the red rocks of Sedona, we have it!

The choice is yours but I am always happy to offer suggestions.

After the Shoot

Once we have wrapped, its time for me to get busy on your photos. I will have all those amazing images edited and delivered via an online gallery to you within two weeks of your session. This downloadable gallery will have two copies of your photos. One set will be high res that can be printed (perfect for save-the-date) and the other set will be sized for social media sharing. Your gallery can be shared with friends and family so they can share in the fun of your engagement!

FAQs

How long is an engagement session?

They typically go for about an hour. Some couples like to bring several outfits that may take a bit longer and that’s fine.

Can you help us pick a location?

Absolutely. Some couples have that special place in mind others just want something nice or different. I can help with those requests.

We may want to travel out of the Phoenix area, say Sedona. Does that cost extra?

It does not as long as the session is within the state of AZ! Outside the state, there will be additional travel fees.

Can we bring our pets?

Absolutley! I’m a huge dog fan.

Speaking of outfits, how many should we bring?

That is totally up to you. Typically clients will bring a minimum of two (casual & dressy). Sometimes they will bring additional such as college wear. I’m happy to consult with you guys.

How long until we get our photos?

Engagement photos are delivered back to you within two weeks of the session via online gallery.

We are just interested in an engagment session right now, do you offer those separately?

I do. That is an ala carte charge and if you have hire me for your wedding that cost will be applied towards your wedding.

We have a few more questions.

Alright, let’s get those answered. You can contact me using the contact form at the bottom of this page or at 480-223-8615 and chris@chrisfrailey.com.

Testimonials

What they Say

Chris is an amazing photographer! Our photos turned out even better than we could have ever imagined and Chris helped us include our dog in the shoot as well! Chris is so fun, he makes you feel relaxed and and the whole shoot was so fun. We recommend him 100%!
Jenn
Chris was wonderful and we had so much fun doing our pictures with him. His turn around time was increadily quick and our pictures are amazing!
Ashley

Engagement

Gallery

4199753770d665dee7989ea73412bc44-672.name: Photography – Seniors
4199753770d665dee7989ea73412bc44-672.content:
“From the moment I sat in the makeup chair to the last shot of the day I felt nothing but joy and excitement. Chris and I shared the same vision and my photos couldn’t have come out better!”

-Sandra
View Gallery

The Boutique Experience

High school senior pictures have come a long way. No longer are you forced into a boring headshot that looks like everyone else’s? You are different and that’s a great thing. Your senior pics are a once-in-a-lifetime event. Choosing a photographer for this moment can be a daunting task. You want creativity and someone who will LISTEN to your ideas.

That’s where we come in. Chris Frailey Seniors is not some huge company where you are just another paying customer. We value you as OUR client. It starts with our pre-shoot consultation where we discuss your wardrobe ideas to help you look your best. We go over what to expect during the session easing any anxiety of being “in front of the camera”. During your shoot we coach you along the way for the best poses so you rock your pics. Your Instagram will never look the same! And finally during the gallery reveal session we will help you select your favorites from all those amazing photos.

Blow Up Your Social Media

It's Your

12th Year

You have arrived! It started with that first day of kindergarten. Nervous and scared as you walked in the classroom not knowing a single soul. Along the way friendships were formed and adventures were shared. From playground shenanigans to getting your driver’s license, you have grown up.

Your Story, Let's Show the World

“I had so much fun taking photos with Chris. It was an amazing and worthy experience that I would recommend to anyone!”

-Clemmy

It's time to let

Your Memories Come to Life

Leather Albums

Wall Prints

Become an

Influencer

We are looking for fun, outgoing, and creative juniors to represent us. If you like being in front of the camera and want a fun time with your senior photos, then you may be our next Senior Influencer! 
Learn More

Senior

Gallery

4199753770d665dee7989ea73412bc44-674.name: Photography – Senior Influencer
4199753770d665dee7989ea73412bc44-674.content:
We are looking for fun, outgoing, and creative juniors to represent us. If you like being in front of the camera and want a fun time with your senior photos, then you may be our next Senior Influencer! Senior Influencers are students who represent our studio. You are our face, our spokesmodels! All you have to do is tell your friends about us. Tell them about your experience and refer them our way. Pretty easy!

So WHAT'S In It For You?

It’s truly a win-win situation, we get your energetic recommendations to all your friends, classmates and family as well as your images to use in our marketing tools, and you get…

FREE ON-LOCATION FASHION SHOOT
PROFESSIONAL HAIR AND MAKEUP
2 FASHION DRESS RENTALS
OPTION TO EARN $1,000 IN PRODUCTS

Refer 5 paying friends to our studio and you get $1k in product credit!

Sounds GREAT, What Do I Do Now?

Requirements:
  1. You apply through our senior questionnaire for acceptance
  2. You agree to represent only our studio.
  3. You agree to hand out rep cards provided by us to all your friends and classmates.
  4. You promote and recommend us and share details of your session experience with your friends and classmates.
  5. You agree to allow us to utilize your name and image in advertising, both online and printed.
  6. You and parent (guardian) agree to sign a model release.
  7. To earn $1,000 in products, you must refer five paying seniors to our studio. You will earn an additional $25 in credit for each referral afterwards.

Ready to Get Started

apply Now

Want to Learn More

Senior Influencer Magazine

4199753770d665dee7989ea73412bc44-677.name: Photography – Senior Pricing
4199753770d665dee7989ea73412bc44-677.content:
Pricing

Hello! Below you will find our senior photography session fees (prints & digital products additional) for each of our fabulous offerings. A fifty percent deposit will hold your spot and guarantee availability.

The Runway - $150

Our fashion model experience will have you strutting your stuff!! Your session fee includes:

  • One hour of shooting in studio
  • Two outfit changes
  • Unlimited poses as time permits
  • Gallery reveal session to view your images
  • Signature edits on all purchased products

The Duo - $250

Can’t decide, get the best of both worlds. Your session fee includes:

  • One hour studio time with two outfit changes
  • One hour on-location with one outfit shooting in the greater Phoenix area
  • Gallery reveal session to view your images
  • Signature edits on all purchased products

Your gallery reveal will include both sessions so you can experience all of your amazing pictures at once.

Destination - $500

We love traveling with our clients or coming to you. Shooting in new and exciting places gets our adrenaline going. Rather you are local wanting to go to the beach or live far from Arizona, we can put together a destination shoot tailored for you.

Print and Digital Products

Approximately 2 weeks after your session, we will schedule your gallery reveal. During this session we will go through all of your amazing images and select your favorites. We offer a variety of print options including metals, keepsake books, and albums. Digitals are available as they are a great way to share with family and friends. View our product guide here.

4199753770d665dee7989ea73412bc44-678.name: Photography – Family Photos
4199753770d665dee7989ea73412bc44-678.content:
Outdoor Family Photos You Will Cherish

View Gallery

Getting Ready

Family photos do not have to be complicated or boring. A few things to consider when getting ready for your session. Schedule times that are best for the youngest in the family. This will help ensure they are at their best. Haircuts should be done about a week ahead of time if possible. Matching clothes are fun for photos, but are not necessary.

Wardrobe

Choosing clothes for everyone can be a daunting task. One way to keep it simple is matching outfits for everyone. A classic white shirt and khakis is always a favorite. However family members may want to show their own style and it’s a perfect way to capture those moments in their life. Typically solid colors tend to photograph better than striped patterns, but that is more of a suggestion than a hard rule.

Locations

We are blessed here in Arizona with so many choices for outdoor family photos. Naturally we have our desert and cactus, but there is so much more. Downtown Phoenix offers that big city urban vibe, while surrounding areas have plenty of parks with trees for a more natural feel. The botanical garden or an afternoon at the zoo both make for awesome photos! The possibilities are endless!!!

FAQs

How long is a session?

They typically go for about an hour. Some couples like to bring several outfits that may take a bit longer and that’s fine.

We are not sure where to have our pictures taken, can you help?

Absolutely. I can provide a list of great spots!

We have a big family. Is that a problem?

It is not. The more the merrier!

Can we bring our pets?

Absolutley! I’m a huge dog fan.

How much are sessions?

Your session fee is $150. Digital prints and printed products are additional purchases.

How long until we get our photos?

Your photos are delivered back to you within two weeks of the proof viewing session via an online gallery for digital and printed products.

What happens after the shoot?

We will schedule a time for you to come in about a week after the shoot to view your proofs and pick your favorites to purchase.

We have a few more questions.

Alright, let’s get those answered. You can contact me using the contact form at the bottom of this page or at 480-223-8615 and chris@chrisfrailey.com.

Family

Gallery

4199753770d665dee7989ea73412bc44-679.name: Photography – Fitness
4199753770d665dee7989ea73412bc44-679.content:
YOU’VE DONE THE WORK, LETS SHOW THE WORLD

View Gallery

What to Expect

I typically do an online consult with each client to determine what they are after. Is it portfolio building for their website so they can show their best physique? Perhaps they are growing their social media and want something far beyond the average cell phone selfie. We will hash it out and determine if a studio session or an on-location fits your needs (or both).


Studio or on-location sessions are up two hours long. Plan to go through about 4-6 outfits as we will get you a variety of images to obsess over.

What to Wear

Fitness attire of course is always my client’s first choice. Typically a sport / jog bra top and workout (booty) shorts. The goal is to show off your hard work. Don’t be afraid to throw in one or two lifestyle looks if you want to look great out of gym clothes. This can take on something simple as jean shorts and a top, or go all out in a cocktail dress. 

Location

As a fitness photographer I’m proud to offer clients a choice of studio or on-location. For studio I have choices available in Mesa and Tempe that are both located near major freeways for easy access. Your favorite music will be cranking away as strobes light up that amazing physique you have carved out.

On-location we have so many choices here in the Phoenix area. From gritty urban areas with graffati to open desert and everything in-between we will get you in some great locations. I like to shoot near sunset to take advantage of the golden hour for the best light. If your schedule needs something different I’m happy to accomodate.

FAQs

I’ve never had pro photos taken, will you help guide me?

Absolutely. Many of my clients have never been in front of a professional photographer. I’m here to help you look your best!

Can you help us pick a location?

Sure can. I have a mile long list of locations.

I would love to go to Sedona for my session. Do you travel?

I do. There will be a trip charge outside the Phoenix area.

Can we bring our pets?

Absolutely if we are on-location in a pet friendly area! I’m a huge dog fan.

Can I bring a friend to the session to watch?

Absolutely! All that I ask is they don’t interfere during the shoot.

Speaking of outfits, how many should we bring?

I always suggest 6-8 so you have a variety on the day of the shoot. Sometimes when we get started you just don’t feel one of them so it’s good to have options.

I would love to have professional hair and makeup done. Do you have recs?

I do and can provide you with several options.

I have a few more questions.

Alright, let’s get those answered. You can contact me using the contact form at the bottom of this page or at 480-223-8615 and chris@chrisfrailey.com.

Fitness

Gallery

4199753770d665dee7989ea73412bc44-680.name: Photography – Studio Sessions
4199753770d665dee7989ea73412bc44-680.content:
STUDIO PHOTOGRAPHY FOR EVERY NEED

View Gallery

Studio Experience

Every session begins with a consultation to define what you are after. We will plan out your looks, discuss wardrobe, and go over hair and makeup options. When you arrive at the studio your faovorite music will be playing to set the mood. For the next hour you will be front and center rocking your best looks as the strobes fire away.

Wardrobe Options

Wardrobe selection is a key element to any photo shoot. You want your looks to match what your end goal is for your pictures. This is why we do a pre-shoot consultation to ensure we get what you want. Perhaps you are a dancer, and need help on style and color choices of the dresses you want to wear. We will go over every idea you have and find the perfect fit.

Posing and Lighting

This is where I thrive. I’m a total lighting geek. I live for ligthing my clients with the best techiques to maximize their look. If you have no experience at all in posing, don’t worry as I will lead you through the session. For those who are experienced, rest assured the session flow will not stop while you hit every pose.

FAQs

How long is the studio session?

They typically go for about an hour.

I’ve never modeled before, can you help me pose?

Absolutely. I will walk you through every pose if need be to make sure you look your best. No worries!

I want to go all out with hair and makeup, can you help me find someon?

I sure can. I’ve workded with several artists over the years.

We did the search for “studio photography near me” and found you. What makes you different?

With over 12 years in photography, I know how to represent my clients in the best manner possible. There is no ego when you walk into my studio. I listen to my clients and work with them on getting stellar imagery.

Speaking of outfits, how many should I bring?

That is totally up to you and we will discuss during the consultation. It generally falls into 3-5 outfits.

How long until we get our photos?

Engagement photos are delivered back to you within two weeks of the session via online gallery.

Do you do boudoir sessions?

I do. I keep things tasteful yet sexy. For those interested I have references I can provide as well as private galleries to show my style and how I shoot.

We have a few more questions.

Alright, let’s get those answered. You can contact me using the contact form at the bottom of this page or at 480-223-8615 and chris@chrisfrailey.com.

Studio

Gallery

4199753770d665dee7989ea73412bc44-684.name: Photography – About
4199753770d665dee7989ea73412bc44-684.content:
Hi, I'm Chris

A Photographer in Arizona

…20 things about Chris Frailey Photography…

… an over sized playmate to two adorable children …

… a husband to the most wonderful wife for the past 24 years …

… a wannabe basketball player who moonlights in Sunday city leagues …

… someone who wants to live in beautiful Colorado but currently lives in the Arizona desert …

… a Phoenix photographer who is passionate about photography and the way it moves people …

… that guy you see riding the shopping cart in the grocery store parking lot …

… a person who believes rules are made to be broken, shattered, and then stomped on …

… who believes black diamond runs are a skier’s best friend …

… was raised with a mid-west work ethic …

… thinks everyone should see Las Vegas at least once to appreciate the gawdyness …

… a die hard college hoops fans, go Jayhawks! …

… a storm chaser …

… someone who has jumped out of a perfectly good airplane …

… drinks chocolate milk every morning for breakfast …

… dreams of traveling the world …

… never misses an opportunity to embarrass his children …

… believes that camping in the mountains makes for great vacations …

… a dog lover …

…believes tacos are the only food group…

… wants to be your photographer …

Free Engagement Session Giveaway

Hello! We are drawing for 5 winners to receive a FREE engagement session that includes a complimentary 11x14 print. Here is your chance to try out a photographer for FREE.

Giveaway Details

The location can be anywhere in the Phoenix metro area. Sessions will last about an hour and will be scheduled during the week. Pets are welcome!

We will set up a date at the end of the session to to meet back up and go over your proofs. At this time you will select your favorite photo for your  FREE 11×14 print. Remaining images can be purchased if you desire. Should you decide to hire me for your wedding, all of your engagement photos will be given to you.

4199753770d665dee7989ea73412bc44-692.name: Quad Table Content
4199753770d665dee7989ea73412bc44-692.content:
Engagements

Every couple's story started with a YES. Getting to work with my client's in that early part of the wedding journey is such a treat. It's a time they get to relax & just enjoy the moments. I get a chance to connect with my couple and hear how they met as it never gets old. As a wedding photographer in Phoenix I enjoy taking them on a mini adventure in our beautiful state. Whatever the adventure may be, I'm ready for it.

View Packages

Weddings

I live for wedding day with my couples. It's a day I get to serve my clients in so many ways as a photographer. I get to be a portrait photographer, a family photographer, a details photographer, but most importantly I get to be a trusted advisor on their big day. I've been down this path a few times and know how emotions can run. I'm there every step with my couples making sure they are enjoying their day all the while capturing it for them.

View Packages

Seniors

High school senior pictures have come a long ways. No longer are you forced into a boring headshot that looks like everyone else’s. You are different and that’s a great thing. Your senior pics are a once in a lifetime event. Our senior experience starts with our pre-shoot consultation where we discuss your wardrobe ideas to help you look your best. During your shoot we coach you along the way for the best poses so you rock your pics. Your Instagram will never look the same! 

View Packages

Fitness

What started as a niche area for me has grown into a true passion. Working with the fitness athlete has exposed me to a whole new world of "being in shape". I am continually humbled by the dedication and perseverance my clients make to achieve their athletic form. The sacrifice is real. Rather it be photographing them with dramatic lighting in studio or being on-location in Arizona, I get to showcase their amazing efforts.

View Packages

4199753770d665dee7989ea73412bc44-697.name: Symmetrical Content Sections
4199753770d665dee7989ea73412bc44-697.content:
Wedding Style

I believe the essence of a wedding are those candid moments that happen throughout the day. Rather it be a moment with your bridesmaids or the groom getting choked up reading his vows, those are what make your wedding special. I’ll get a few of those posed photos to make Mom happy but I want you to look back and relive your wedding exactly as it happened. 

It's all in the Details

Every piece of your wedding is special. You knew the moment when you found “the dress”. Earrings and shoes were close behind. Family keepsakes may be worn during the day to honor your grandparents. All of these items are dear to you and make your wedding unique. I make sure to photograph those details so you never forget that day, all of it. From wedding dresses to wedding rings and everything in between you will have it.
